00024 TcpServer::~TcpServer()
00025 {
00026     Disconnect();
00027     Close();
00028 
00029     if ( BufferForMultipleClients )
00030     {
00031         delete [] BufferForMultipleClients;
00032         BufferForMultipleClients = NULL;
00033     }
00034 }

00036 void TcpServer::Create(int port)
00037 {
00038     InitForTcpServer(port);
00039     StartThread();
00040 }

00042 void TcpServer::Disconnect()
00043 {
00044     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00045 
00046     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00047     {
00048         delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00049         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 void TcpServer::Close()
00054 {
00055     StopThread();
00056     GetSocket()->Close();
00057 }

00059 int TcpServer::SendToClient(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid)
00060 {
00061     // OmiscidTrace( "TcpServer::SendToClient\n");
00062     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00063 
00064     MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId(pid);
00065     int nb_send = 0;
00066     if ( ms != (MsgSocket*)NULL )
00067     {
00068         //ms->IsConnected()  : tested by FindClientFromId
00069         try
00070         {
00071             nb_send = ms->Send(len, buf);
00072         }
00073         catch( SocketException &e )
00074         {
00075             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to %8.8x peer : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     return nb_send;
00080 }

00082 int TcpServer::SendToClient(int* tab_len, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf, unsigned int pid)
00083 {
00084     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00085 
00086     MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId(pid);
00087     int nb_send = 0;
00088 
00089     if ( ms != (MsgSocket*)NULL )
00090     {
00091         //ms->IsConnected() tested by FindClientFromId
00092         try
00093         {
00094             nb_send = ms->SendCuttedMsg(tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf);
00095         }
00096         catch( SocketException &e )
00097         {
00098             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to %8.8x peer : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     return nb_send;
00103 }

00105 int TcpServer::SendToAllClients(int len, const char* buf)
00106 {
00107     int nb_clients = 0;
00108     int TotalLen;
00109     MsgSocket * ms;
00110 
00111     // Check if we have someone to serve
00112     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00113 
00114     if ( listConnections.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00115     {
00116         return 0;
00117     }
00118 
00119     SmartLocker SL_ProtectedSend(ProtectedSend);
00120 
00121     // If message is too big, we do not try to do optimisation
00122     if ( len > maxBIPMessageSize )
00123     {
00124         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00125         {
00126             ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00127             if( ms->IsConnected() )
00128             {
00129                 try
00130                 {
00131                     ms->Send(len, buf);
00132                     nb_clients++;
00133                 }
00134                 catch( SocketException &e )
00135                 {
00136                     OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00137                 }
00138             }
00139             else
00140             {
00141                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00142                 delete ms;
00143             }
00144         }
00145 
00146         return nb_clients;
00147     }
00148 
00149     TotalLen = MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBip( BufferForMultipleClients, buf, len );
00150     if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00151     {
00152         return -1;
00153     }
00154 
00155     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00156     {
00157         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00158         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00159         {
00160             try
00161             {
00162                 ms->SendPreparedBuffer(TotalLen, BufferForMultipleClients);
00163                 nb_clients++;
00164             }
00165             catch( SocketException &e )
00166             {
00167                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00168             }
00169         }
00170         else
00171         {
00172             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00173             delete ms;
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177     return nb_clients;
00178 }

00180 int TcpServer::SendToAllClients(int* tab_len, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
00181 {
00182     int nb_clients = 0;
00183     int TotalLen;
00184     int i;
00185     MsgSocket * ms;
00186 
00187     // Check if we have someone to serve
00188     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00189 
00190     if ( listConnections.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00191     {
00192         return 0;
00193     }
00194 
00195     for( i = 0, TotalLen = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00196     {
00197         TotalLen += tab_len[0];
00198     }
00199 
00200     // If message is too big, we do not try to do optimisation
00201     if ( TotalLen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00202     {
00203         for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00204         {
00205             ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00206             if( ms->IsConnected() )
00207             {
00208                 try
00209                 {
00210                     ms->SendCuttedMsg(tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf );
00211                     nb_clients++;
00212                 }
00213                 catch( SocketException &e )
00214                 {
00215                     OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00216                 }
00217             }
00218             else
00219             {
00220                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00221                 delete ms;
00222             }
00223         }
00224 
00225         return nb_clients;
00226     }
00227 
00228     SmartLocker SL_ProtectedSend(ProtectedSend);
00229 
00230     TotalLen = MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg( BufferForMultipleClients, tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf);
00231     if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00232     {
00233         return -1;
00234     }
00235 
00236     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00237     {
00238         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00239         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00240         {
00241             try
00242             {
00243                 ms->SendPreparedBuffer(TotalLen, BufferForMultipleClients);
00244                 nb_clients++;
00245             }
00246             catch( SocketException &e )
00247             {
00248                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00249             }
00250         }
00251         else
00252         {
00253             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00254             delete ms;
00255         }
00256     }
00257 
00258     return nb_clients;
00259 }

00262 int TcpServer::GetNbConnections()
00263 {
00264     MsgSocket * ms;
00265 
00266     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00267 
00268     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next())
00269     {
00270         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00271         if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00272         {
00273             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00274             delete ms;
00275         }
00276     }
00277 
00278     int nb = (int)listConnections.GetNumberOfElements();
00279 
00280     return nb;
00281 }

00283 bool TcpServer::AcceptConnection(MsgSocket* sock)
00284 {
00285     // OmiscidTrace( "in TcpServer::acceptConnection(MsgSocket*) %u\n", sock->GetPeerPid());
00286 
00287     // OmiscidTrace( "TcpServer::AcceptConnection:: connection from (%s)\n", sock->GetSocket()->GetConnectedHost().GetStr());
00288 
00289     SmartLocker SL_protectSend( protectSend );  // Prevent send before synchronisation
00290     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00291 
00292     // Init the socket
00293     // REVIEW: Inherit my SyndLink data
00294     SmartLocker SL_mutex(mutex);
00295 
00296     if ( SyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00297     {
00298         sock->SetSyncLinkData( SyncLinkData  );
00299     }
00300     // If we have a fonction set to process LincSyncData, set it to the opened connection
00301     if ( callbackSyncLinkFct )
00302     {
00303         sock->SetCallbackSyncLink( callbackSyncLinkFct, callbackSyncLinkData.userData1, callbackSyncLinkData.userData2 );
00304     }
00305     SL_mutex.Unlock();
00306 
00307     // Add all my listener to the new socket
00308     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00309     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00310     {
00311         // Add this listener
00312         sock->AddCallbackObject( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() );
00313     }
00314     SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00315 
00316     sock->SetTcpNoDelay(TcpNoDelayMode);
00317     sock->SetName(GetName());
00318     sock->SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00319     sock->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(MsgSocket::GetMaxMessageSizeForTCP());
00320     sock->StartThread();
00321 
00322     listConnections.Add(sock);
00323     SL_listConnections.Unlock();
00324 
00325     // Send empty message information
00326     sock->SendSyncLinkMsg();
00327 
00328     return true;
00329 }

00331 bool TcpServer::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00332 {
00333     if ( MsgSocket::AddCallbackObject( CallbackObject ) == false )
00334     {
00335         return false;
00336     }
00337 
00338     MsgSocket* ms;
00339     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00340     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00341     {
00342         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00343         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00344         {
00345             ms->AddCallbackObject( CallbackObject );
00346         }
00347         else
00348         {
00349             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00350             delete ms;
00351         }
00352     }
00353 
00354     return true;
00355 }

00407 int TcpServer::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& list_peer)
00408 {
00409     MsgSocket * ms;
00410     int nb = 0;
00411 
00412     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00413     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00414     {
00415         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00416         if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00417         {
00418             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00419             delete ms;
00420         }
00421         else
00422         {
00423             list_peer.Add(ms->GetPeerPid());
00424             nb++;
00425         }
00426     }
00427     return nb;
00428 }

00430 void TcpServer::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00431 {
00432     // Check validity of a service Id
00433     if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00434     {
00435         // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00436 #ifdef DEBUG
00437         //              fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for TcpServer. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00438 #endif
00439     }
00440     MsgSocket::SetServiceId(pid);
00441 
00442     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00443     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00444     {
00445         if( listConnections.GetCurrent()->IsConnected() )
00446         {
00447             listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetServiceId(pid);
00448         }
00449         else
00450         {
00451             delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00452             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00453         }
00454     }
00455 }

00465             listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);

00474 MsgSocket* TcpServer::FindClientFromId(unsigned int id)
00475 {
00476     MsgSocket * ms;
00477 
00478     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00479     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00480     {
00481         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00482         if( *ms == id )
00483         {
00484             if( ms->IsConnected() )
00485             {
00486                 return ms;
00487             }
00488             else
00489             {
00490                 delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00491                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00492                 // look forward to look if there is not another pid
00493             }
00494         }
00495     }
00496 
00497     unsigned int SearchId = id & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00498 
00499     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00500     {
00501         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00502         if( SearchId == (ms->GetPeerPid() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00503         {
00504             if ( ms->IsConnected() )
00505             {
00506                 return ms;
00507             }
00508         }
00509     }
00510 
00511     return NULL;
00512 }
00513 
00515 bool TcpServer::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00516 {
00517     MsgSocket * ms;
00518     bool ret = false;
00519     unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00520 
00521     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00522     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00523     {
00524         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00525         if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00526         {
00527             delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00528             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00529             continue;
00530         }
00531 
00532         if ( SearchId == (ms->GetPeerPid() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00533         {
00534             delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00535             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00536             ret = true;
00537             continue;
00538         }
00539     }
00540 
00541     return ret;
00542 }

00544 bool TcpServer::SetTcpNoDelay(bool Set)
00545 {
00546     bool ReturnCode = true;
00547 
00548     if ( Set == TcpNoDelayMode )
00549         return true;
00550 
00551     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00552 
00553     TcpNoDelayMode = Set;
00554 
00555     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00556     {
00557         ReturnCode = ReturnCode & listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetTcpNoDelay(TcpNoDelayMode);
00558     }
00559 
00560     return ReturnCode;
00561 }

00583 bool TcpServer::IsStillConnected(unsigned int peer_id)
00584 {
00585     bool res = false;
00586     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00587 
00588     res = FindClientFromId(peer_id) != NULL;
00589 
00590     return res;
00591 }
